subtitleNullable: A tabular dataset for all of the James Bond movies.
descriptionNullable:
## Background 
James Bond (007) is a fictional British Secret Service agent created in 1953 by writer Ian Fleming. The James Bond movies have been shot across the world and several famous actors have portrayed him on film. James Bond, or as he refers to himself in the films "Bond, James Bond", have gross billions of dollars in sales and are known for their unique locations, technology and of course beautiful women "Bond Girls".  

This dataset provides many features about the films such as Year, Actor, Sales, Martinis, etc., which can be used to analyze individually or as a complete series. 

## Content
25 Rows x 27 Columns 

**Year** - *Release year of the movie.*
**Movie** - *The movie title.*
**Bond** - *Actor who played James Bond.*
**Director** - *Director of the movie.*
**Composer** - *Composer of the movie.*
**Writer** - *Writer of the movie.*
**Cinematographer** - *Cinematographer of the movie.*
**Depicted\_Film\_Loc** - *Depicted location(s) of the movie.*
**Shooting\_Loc** - *Shooting location(s) of the move.*
**Bond\_Car\_MFG** - *The manufacturer of the bond car.*
**Bond\_Girl\_Nat** - *The nationality of the bond girl(s).*
**US\_Gross** - *The films U.S gross earnings.*
**US\_Adj**: *The films U.S gross earnings adjusted based on 2013.*
**World\_Gross** - *The films worldwide gross earnings.*
**World\_Adj** - *The films worldwide gross earnings adjusted based on 2013.*
**Budget** - *The films budget.*
**Budget\_Adj** - *The films budget adjust based on 2013.*
**Film\_Length** - *The length of the movie.*
**Avg\_User\_IMDB** - *The average user rating from IMDB.*
**Avg\_User\_Rtn\_Tom** - *The average user rating from Rotten Tomatoes.*
**Conquests** - *The number of bond girls in the movie.*
**Martinis** - *The number of martinis Bond consumed in the movie.*
**BJB** - *The number of times bond stated "Bond, James Bond."*
**Kills\_Bond** - *The number of people Bond killed.*
**Kills\_Others** - *The number of people killed by someone other than bond.*
**Top\_100** - *A flag where 1 means the movie had Billboard/UK top 100 song, 0 means it didn't.*
**Video\_Game** - *A flag where 1 means the movie was made into a video game, 0 means it didn't.*

## Inspiration
**Bond Girl Nationality Preference Recommender** 👩🏾:
Based on the nationality of the "Bond Girls" in all movie create a recommendation system for what is James Bond preference.  

**Predict the Gross Income of the Next Bond Movie** 💰:
Based on the features available can you predict how much income the next Bond movie will produce.

**What are the Most Popular Shooting/Depicted Locations** 🏝️:
Based on the actual shooting location or the depicted ones determine the most widely used locations in the films. 

## Acknowledgements
This dataset uses work from Derek S. Young (2014) [Bond R Data Package][1] and adds additional fields I extracted from different websites. 
Young, D. S. (2014), Bond. James Bond. A Statistical Look at Cinema's Most Famous Spy, Chance, 27, 21–27.
[1]: https://rdrr.io/cran/HoRM/man/JamesBond.html
title: James Bond Movie Dataset
subtitle: A tabular dataset for all of the James Bond movies.
